articles.description: Racially motivated attacks against Asian Americans have been on the rise since the start of the pandemic, but a Los Angeles-based civil rights group says the actual numbers are even higher.
articles.title: Anti-Asian Attacks Higher Than Numbers Indicate, Group Says - NPR
